contents.text: Hello and thank you for calling Stitch Labs, your San Francisco partner for scalable inventory management for high-growth e-commerce brands.
Press 1 for technical support and API assistance.
Please hold while we connect you with a technical support specialist.

navigationGoals: Connect me with a technical specialist to resolve an API integration issue affecting our inventory sync.
I need help integrating the Stitch Labs API with my online store.
I’m encountering authentication errors with your inventory API and need technical assistance debugging the webhook integration.
Could you please help me connect my store to your service? I'm not very tech-savvy.
I need help debugging my Stitch Labs API integration for my online lab supplies store.

contents.text: Press 2 for billing and account questions.
Please hold while we connect you with our billing team.

navigationGoals: I need to update my payment method and clarify a recent invoice charge.
I want to clarify a recent billing charge and update my payment method.
I need to review last month’s subscription invoice charges and update the credit card on file for our enterprise account.
I need to understand my recent invoice and update how I pay, please.
I have questions about my current subscription invoice and need clarification on the recent billing charges.

contents.text: Press 2 for sales, demos, or new account setup.
Press 1 to speak with a sales representative.
Please hold while we connect you with a sales representative.

navigationGoals: I’d like to speak with a sales rep about setting up a new account and pricing options.
I’d like to discuss new account setup and pricing options for my veteran-led business.
I’m evaluating enterprise plans—I'd like to discuss volume pricing tiers and schedule a demo of the platform’s advanced features.
I'm thinking about signing up; could someone explain the plans and costs clearly?
I’d like to arrange a demo and get pricing details to set up a new Stitch Labs account for my project.

contents.text: Press 2 for onboarding and training information.
Please hold while we connect you with our onboarding team.

navigationGoals: Please help me schedule onboarding sessions and access training resources for my team.
I need an onboarding walkthrough and training resources for my team.
I need onboarding guidance and training resources for my dev team to implement your SDK and inventory sync best practices.
I need a basic walkthrough of how to use the inventory system, step by step.
I’m looking for onboarding resources and training documentation to get my team started with Stitch Labs.
